description.zh-cn: 唐代文学家，文章精切，特别擅长写诗，是中唐最具代表性的诗人之一，倡导新乐府运动。
description.en: A Tang dynasty writer and poet, one of the most representative poets of the mid-Tang period, and an advocate of the New Yuefu movement.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝诗人，白居易的终身好友，二人同为新乐府运动的伙伴。
description.en: A Tang dynasty poet, lifelong friend of Bai Juyi, and a partner in the New Yuefu movement.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝文学家、哲学家，白居易晚年在洛阳时常与之唱和。
description.en: A Tang dynasty writer and philosopher, who often exchanged poems with Bai Juyi in his later years in Luoyang.

description.zh-cn: 唐代伟大的现实主义诗人，其作品对白居易的讽谕诗创作有重要影响。
description.en: A great realist poet of the Tang dynasty, whose works significantly influenced Bai Juyi's satirical poetry.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝第十一位皇帝。白居易因直言进谏曾令其不快，后将白居易贬官。
description.en: The 11th emperor of the Tang dynasty. He was displeased by Bai Juyi's direct remonstrations and later demoted him.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝第十六位皇帝，曾褒奖白居易为“诗仙”。
description.en: The 16th emperor of the Tang dynasty, who praised Bai Juyi as the 'Poet Immortal'.

description.zh-cn: 唐代诗人，在白居易早年拜访时对其诗作大加赞赏，并为之延誉。
description.en: A Tang dynasty poet who greatly admired Bai Juyi's poems upon their first meeting and helped promote his reputation.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝宰相，曾在唐宪宗面前为白居易的直言敢谏辩护。
description.en: A chancellor of the Tang dynasty who defended Bai Juyi's outspokenness to Emperor Xianzong.

description.zh-cn: 白居易的父亲，曾任襄州别驾等官职。
description.en: Bai Juyi's father, who served as Assistant Prefect of Xiangzhou and other official positions.

description.zh-cn: 白居易的母亲。其意外坠井身亡一事后被政敌用作诽谤白居易的理由。
description.en: Bai Juyi's mother. Her accidental death by falling into a well was later used by political opponents to slander Bai Juyi.

description.zh-cn: 唐代文学家，白居易的弟弟。
description.en: A Tang dynasty writer, and the younger brother of Bai Juyi.

description.zh-cn: 白居易的妻子，出身弘农杨氏。
description.en: Bai Juyi's wife, from the Yang clan of Hongnong.

description.zh-cn: 白居易蓄养的家妓，以善歌闻名。
description.en: A house-entertainer kept by Bai Juyi, famous for her singing skills.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史上的一个朝代，白居易在此期间生活并担任官职。
description.en: A dynasty in Chinese history, during which Bai Juyi lived and served as an official.

description.zh-cn: 由白居易、元稹等人倡导的诗歌革新运动，主张诗歌应反映社会现实，发挥讽谕作用。
description.en: A poetry reform movement advocated by Bai Juyi, Yuan Zhen, and others, which proposed that poetry should reflect social reality and serve a satirical function.

description.zh-cn: 815年，唐朝宰相武元衡遇刺身亡的事件。白居易因上表主张严缉凶手而得罪权贵，成为其被贬谪的导火索。
description.en: The assassination of Tang dynasty chancellor Wu Yuanheng in 815. Bai Juyi's call for a thorough investigation angered powerful figures, leading to his demotion.

description.zh-cn: 位于今河南省，是白居易的出生地。
description.en: Located in modern-day Henan Province, it is the birthplace of Bai Juyi.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝的东都，白居易晚年多在此居住并最终逝世。
description.en: The eastern capital of the Tang dynasty, where Bai Juyi spent most of his later years and eventually passed away.

description.zh-cn: 白居易创作的著名长篇叙事诗，描述了唐玄宗与杨贵妃的爱情悲剧。
description.en: A famous long narrative poem by Bai Juyi, describing the tragic love story of Emperor Xuanzong and Yang Guifei.

description.zh-cn: 白居易创作的著名长篇叙事诗，记叙了作者在被贬谪江州途中与一位琵琶女的相遇。
description.en: A famous long narrative poem by Bai Juyi, recounting his encounter with a pipa player while he was demoted and on his way to Jiangzhou.

description.zh-cn: 白居易的个人诗文集，由其本人编辑、好友元稹作序并协助编成。
description.en: The personal collection of Bai Juyi's poems and writings, edited by himself, with a preface by his friend Yuan Zhen who also assisted in its compilation.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝在位时间最长的皇帝，其与杨贵妃的爱情故事是《长恨歌》的主题。
description.en: The longest-reigning emperor of the Tang dynasty, whose love story with Yang Guifei is the subject of the 'Song of Everlasting Regret'.

description.zh-cn: 唐玄宗的贵妃，中国古代四大美女之一，《长恨歌》的主角之一。
description.en: A consort of Emperor Xuanzong of Tang, one of the Four Beauties of ancient China, and a main character in the 'Song of Everlasting Regret'.

description.zh-cn: 白行简是白居易的弟弟。
description.en: Bai Xingjian is Bai Juyi's younger brother.

description.zh-cn: 白行简是白居易的弟弟。
description.en: Bai Xingjian is Bai Juyi's younger brother.

description.zh-cn: 与元稹订交，成为终身的好友，二人齐名，号“元白”。
description.en: Became friends with Yuan Zhen, forming a lifelong friendship. They were equally famous and known as 'Yuan-Bai'.

description.zh-cn: 晚年与刘禹锡唱和甚多，人称为“刘白”。
description.en: In his later years, he frequently exchanged poems with Liu Yuxi, and they were known as 'Liu-Bai'.

description.zh-cn: 白居易是继杜甫之后实际派文学的重要领袖人物之一，其讽谕诗的创作受到杜甫很大的激励。
description.en: Bai Juyi was one of the important leaders of the realist literary school after Du Fu, and his satirical poetry was greatly inspired by Du Fu.

description.zh-cn: 在白居易早年拜访时，顾况对其诗篇大加赞赏并为之延誉，使其声名大振。
description.en: When Bai Juyi visited him in his early years, Gu Kuang highly praised his poems and helped promote his reputation, making him famous.

description.zh-cn: 当唐宪宗对白居易的直言感到不快时，李绛为白居易辩护，认为这是其忠心的表现。
description.en: When Emperor Xianzong was displeased with Bai Juyi's directness, Li Jiang defended Bai Juyi, arguing it was a sign of his loyalty.

description.zh-cn: 因上表主张严缉刺杀宰相武元衡的凶手，白居易被认为是越职言事，加之被诽谤，最终被贬为江州司马。
description.en: After submitting a memorial advocating for the strict arrest of the assassins of Chancellor Wu Yuanheng, Bai Juyi was accused of overstepping his authority. Coupled with slander, he was eventually demoted to the position of Sima of Jiangzhou.

description.zh-cn: 在武元衡遇刺案后，因白居易越职言事及被诽谤，唐宪宗将其贬为江州司马。
description.en: After the assassination of Wu Yuanheng, Emperor Xianzong demoted Bai Juyi to Sima of Jiangzhou because he overstepped his authority and was slandered.

description.zh-cn: 曾褒白居易为“诗仙”，并在其去世后作吊唁诗，评价其一生。
description.en: He praised Bai Juyi as the 'Poet Immortal' and wrote a eulogy poem after his death, summarizing his life.

description.zh-cn: 倡导新乐府运动，主张“文章合为时而著，歌诗合为事而作”。
description.en: Advocated the New Yuefu Movement, proposing that 'essays should be written for the times, and poems should be created for events'.

description.zh-cn: 创作了长篇叙事诗《长恨歌》。
description.en: Authored the long narrative poem 'Song of Everlasting Regret'.

description.zh-cn: 在江州司马任上创作了长篇叙事诗《琵琶行》。
description.en: Authored the long narrative poem 'Song of the Pipa Player' while serving as Sima of Jiangzhou.

description.zh-cn: 亲自编辑了自己的文集《白氏长庆集》。
description.en: Personally edited his own literary collection, 'Collected Works of Bai Juyi'.

description.zh-cn: 为《白氏长庆集》作序并协助编成。
description.en: Wrote the preface for and assisted in the compilation of the 'Collected Works of Bai Juyi'.

description.zh-cn: 樊素是白居易蓄养的最出名的歌妓之一。
description.en: Fan Su was one of the most famous entertainers kept by Bai Juyi.

description.zh-cn: 《长恨歌》是关于唐玄宗与杨贵妃的爱情故事。
description.en: The 'Song of Everlasting Regret' is about the love story of Emperor Xuanzong and Yang Guifei.

description.zh-cn: 《长恨歌》是关于唐玄宗与杨贵妃的爱情故事。
description.en: The 'Song of Everlasting Regret' is about the love story of Emperor Xuanzong and Yang Guifei.
